headline: Equinix (EQIX): Evaluating Valuation After New SAP Managed Services Collaboration With NetApp and Broadcom
summary: Equinix (EQIX) has teamed up with NetApp, Broadcom, and Kochasoft to launch a managed service tailored for SAP S/4HANA and SAP legacy workloads. This move comes as many SAP clients prepare for critical support changes and look for modern infrastructure. See our latest analysis for Equinix. Equinix’s new SAP-focused partnership comes as the company navigates an eventful year. Shares have rebounded modestly in recent weeks, but the 1-year total shareholder return remains negative at -4.9% after...

headline: Litigation Settlement and AI Expansion Plans Might Change the Case For Investing in Equinix (EQIX)
summary: In October 2025, Robbins Geller Rudman & Dowd LLP announced a proposed US$41.5 million cash settlement in the Equinix securities litigation, with a court hearing set for December 18, 2025. Amid this legal development, Equinix is also making significant long-term investments to expand data center capacity, aiming to capitalize on intensifying global AI demand. We'll examine how Equinix's pending litigation settlement and ongoing AI-focused expansion influence its investment narrative and...

headline: NetApp Collaborates with Equinix to Simplify Virtualization for Modernized SAP Applications
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., October 14, 2025--NetApp® (NASDAQ: NTAP), the Intelligent Data Infrastructure company; Broadcom, Inc.; and Kochasoft, a trusted provider of enterprise solutions, today announced a collaboration with Equinix, the world’s digital infrastructure company®, on a new service offering for SAP S/4HANA & SAP Legacy Workloads running on VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF).
